action.action-desc: Mr. Turner (for himself and Mr. Veasey) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Armed Services

form.official-title: To prohibit the use of funds for the transfer or release of individuals detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, to Afghanistan.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Preventing Terrorist Transfers to Afghanistan Act.

section.header: Prohibition on use of funds for transfer or release of individuals detained at United States Naval Station, Guantanamo Bay, Cuba, to Afghanistan

subsection.text: Section 1035 of the John S. McCain National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2019 (Public Law 115–232; 132 Stat. 1954), as most recently amended by section 1032 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2022 (Public Law 117–81; 135 Stat. 1901), is further amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating paragraphs (1) through (4) as paragraphs (2) through (5), respectively; and
by inserting before paragraph (2), as so redesignated, the following new paragraph:

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall take effect as if enacted on December 27, 2021.
